Text.Page:
Mission Orders:

Researchers studying Blessing Basin's ancient relics have requested federation reinforcements. The teralith, Andras, has gone berserk and is attacking anyone who approaches the artifacts. This research is vital, therefore all vanarchs and their guilds are hereby ordered to join the effort to eliminate {@LinkCreature:26#501#Andras}.
Accept the gratitude of the federation! Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
